alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued July 27 at 2:31PM MDT until July 29 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES WILL CREATE CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS EACH AFTERNOON AND EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY... .Dry southwest flow aloft will continue through Saturday. As a result, gusty southwest winds with low relative humidity will continue into early this evening across Southwest Idaho, especially near the Nevada border, and redevelop Friday afternoon and evening. Gusty winds will spread to Southeast Oregon and far Southwest Idaho on Saturday. The dry and gusty combination will result in periods of critical fire weather conditions. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES FOR OWYHEE MOUNTAINS...WHICH IS FIRE WEATHER ZONE 423... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 9 PM MDT FRIDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES FOR OWYHEE MOUNTAINS... WHICH IS FIRE WEATHER ZONE 423... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES FOR OWYHEE MOUNTAINS...WHICH IS FIRE WEATHER ZONE 423... The National Weather Service in Boise has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 1 PM to 9 PM MDT Friday. A Fire Weather Watch has also been issued, which is in effect from Saturday afternoon through Saturday evening. * WINDS...15 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...8 to 15 percent.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will occur shortly. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are possible. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
